goal.en: 1. Cultivate an open learning attitude towards the world's diverse and diversified culture. 2. Learn the beauty of different cultures and their customs from music. 3. Able to do different special areas and their fusion style. 4. Be able to apply what you have learned, further study, analyze, compare and introduce different music.
goal.ch: 1.培養對世界多元⽂化開放學習的態度。 2.從⾳樂當中認識不同⽂化之美以及其⺠情⾵俗。 3.能夠辦別不同地域的⾳樂特⾊及其融合⾵格。 4.能運⽤所學，進⼀步研究、分析、⽐較、並介紹不同的⾳樂。

content.en:
Week 1: Introduction to the course
Week 2: 1)The four components of a music-culture 2) Structure in music
Week 3: East Asia/ Taiwanese aboriginal music and dance
Week 4: East Asia/ Taiwanese Folk Music, Beiguan and Nanguan tradition
Week 5: Southeast Asia/ Javanese and Balinese Gamelan music
Week 6: Oceania/ Australian aboriginal music, Maoli's music and dance, music of Papua New Guinea
Week 7: South Asia/ Carnatic music of India
Week 8: The Arab World
Week 9: Film screening - The Music of Strangers
Week 10: Post film screening discussion - The Music of Strangers
Week 11: Africa/ The drumming ensemble of Ewe people, the polyphonic singing of BaAka people, Mbira music of Shona people
Week 12: North America/ The Development of African American Music in the United States
Week 13: North America/ Tribal and intertribal music of native American
Week 14: Latin America/ Bolivia, Ecuador, and Peru
Week 15: Latin America/ Mexico, Caribbean, Brazil
Week 16: Europe/ Central, Eastern, Southern, and Northern Europe
Week 17: Final Group Presentation Part 1
Week 18: Final Group Presentation Part 2
content.ch:
第一週: 課程介紹
第二週: 1) 音樂文化的定義 2) 音樂的構成要素
第三週: 東亞／台灣原住民音樂
第四週: 東亞／台灣民謠、南北管音樂傳統
第五週: 東南亞／印尼甘美蘭音樂
第六週: 大洋洲／澳洲原住民音樂、紐西蘭毛利人歌舞、巴布新幾內亞原住民樂舞等
第七週: 南亞／印度音樂
第八週: 中東音樂世界
第九週: 電影欣賞 - The Music of Strangers
第十週: 電影觀後討論
第十一週: 非洲／西非鼓樂、中非雨林民族的歌唱、東南非姆指琴等
第十二週: 北美洲／非洲音樂在美國的發展
第十三週: 北美洲／北美印地安原住民樂舞
第十四週: 拉丁美洲／玻利維亞、厄瓜多、秘魯
第十五週: 拉丁美洲／墨西哥、加勒比海域音樂
第十六週: 中歐、東南歐／民俗歌舞與樂器
第十七週: 期末分組報告 Part 1
第十八週: 期末分組報告 Part 2

grading.en: 1. Attendance rate (15%)2. Class participation notes (15%) 3. Final group report (35%): Select the type of music that was not described by the teacher based on the scope of the world music area included in the course, and collect information , Research and sort out, and introduce to the classmates with gimmick report and PowerPoint presentation. 4. End of the season (35%): Each student is required to submit four final reports of A4, which include (unlimited): 1) Discussion and feedback on the issue of the film MusicofStrangers. 2) What are some of the fun things you learned in class that impressed or surprised you, and what did you learn from them? 3) Besides knowing the world What kind of fun did you get from this lesson?
grading.ch: 1.出席率(15%) 2.課堂參與筆記(15%) 3.期末分組報告(35%):以課程所包含的世界⾳樂地域範圍，選擇⽼師未講述的⾳樂類型，蒐集資料、研究整理，並以⼝頭 報告和PowerPoint的呈現⽅式介紹給班上同學。 4.期末個⼈⼼得(35%):每位同學需繳交四⾴A4的期末⼼得報告，其內容包含(不限):1)電影MusicofStrangers之問題討論及 觀後感。2)舉幾個課堂上所學習到讓你印象深刻或感到驚奇的⾳樂⽂化，你喜歡它的什麼部份?並從其⾳樂⽂化中學習到了 什麼?3)除了認識了世界各地不同的⾳樂，你還從這堂課中得到了什麼?
